Class MeterReadingController

java.lang.Object
com.kf7014.electricityprovidermicroservice.controller.MeterReadingController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/readings") @Validated public class MeterReadingController extends Object
REST controller for managing meter readings.

This controller provides endpoints to receive meter readings, submit manual readings, and retrieve meter readings based on various criteria such as timestamp and meter ID.

Since:
2024-11-27
Version:
1.0
Author:
Muhammad Naqvi

      Constructs a new MeterReadingController with the specified service.

  • Method Details

    • receiveMeterReading

      @PostMapping("/smartmeter") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> receiveMeterReading(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid MeterReading meterReading)
      Receives and stores a smart meter reading.

      This endpoint accepts a MeterReading object from the request body, validates it, and saves it to the repository. It is intended for automated or smart meter submissions.

      Parameters:
      meterReading - the MeterReading to be received and stored
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the operation

    • submitManualReading

      @PostMapping("/manual") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> submitManualReading(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid MeterReading meterReading)
      Submits and stores a manual meter reading.

      This endpoint accepts a MeterReading object from the request body, validates it, and saves it to the repository. It is intended for manual submissions by users.

      Parameters:
      meterReading - the MeterReading to be submitted manually and stored
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the operation

    • getAllMeterReadings

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MeterReading>> getAllMeterReadings(@RequestParam @NotBlank(message="'since' parameter is required") @NotBlank(message="'since' parameter is required") String since)
      Retrieves all meter readings recorded since a specified timestamp.

      This endpoint fetches a list of MeterReading objects that have a timestamp later than the provided since parameter. The since parameter is mandatory.

      Parameters:
      since - the ISO-8601 formatted String representing the starting timestamp
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the list of MeterReading objects or appropriate HTTP status

    • getMeterReadingsByMeterId

      @GetMapping("/meter/{meterId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MeterReading>> getMeterReadingsByMeterId(@PathVariable String meterId, @RequestParam @NotBlank(message="'since' parameter is required") @NotBlank(message="'since' parameter is required") String since)
      Retrieves meter readings for a specific meter ID recorded since a specified timestamp.

      This endpoint fetches a list of MeterReading objects associated with the given meterId and have a timestamp later than the provided since parameter. Both parameters are mandatory.

      Parameters:
      meterId - the unique identifier of the meter
      since - the ISO-8601 formatted String representing the starting timestamp
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the list of MeterReading objects or appropriate HTTP status

    • getLatestMeterReadingByMeterId

      @GetMapping("/meter/{meterId}/latest") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MeterReading> getLatestMeterReadingByMeterId(@PathVariable String meterId)
      Retrieves the latest meter reading for a specific meter ID.

      This endpoint fetches the most recent MeterReading object associated with the given meterId. If no readings are found for the specified meter ID, an HTTP 204 No Content status is returned.

      Parameters:
      meterId - the unique identifier of the meter
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the latest MeterReading object or appropriate HTTP status
